chat_history.message:
Hello, 

My product iPhone 12 has the above problem: 

At the top is my order that should be shipped by June 3rd, 24. Today, on June 4th, 2024, the order status is still 'unshipped' why?

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile

We wanted to let you know Dana hasn’t received their order.

The tracking link doesn't work, so we’re unable to check the package's location.

Can you let us know if the order was shipped, and under which tracking number?
In case the order was not shipped yet, please ship it and provide a valid tracking number, or refund the order under 1 business day.

Dana Sehr
Alter Schulweg 3
51515 Kürten
Deutschland
17672160863
danasehr@yahoo.de

Let us know if you have any questions or concerns — we’ll keep an eye out for your reply.

Thanks for your help,
Claudia, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We're getting ready to ship the parcel and want to ensure everything's perfect. Can we quickly re-confirm if the customer phone number is still the same? This is because a PIN code will be sent to the customer whenever they are not available during the delivery.

The customer's satisfaction is our priority, and this small step helps us guarantee a seamless delivery experience. Just a moment of your time could prevent any delivery issues.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
JY

Hello ecomobile,

We would like to inform you that, in accordance with our Quality Charter, we have refunded 338.06€ to the customer for not respecting the deadline to send the device

Kind regards, 
Claudia from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

The order has already been shipped. Attached is the tracking link for your reference. https://www.ups.com/track?loc=de_de&requester=QUIC&tracknum=1ZBF1560D901190708/trackdetails

May i know why you refunded the customer? Has the refund been made? It has not been made according to our information.

Regards,
TB

Dear ecomobile

I asked for a refund because the deadline for sending the device had passed.

However, as you have since sent the order, the refund has been cancelled.

Regards,
Claudia from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the cancellation of the refund. The device has been delivered to the customer according to the tracking link provided. If the customer does not require any further assistance, please close the case. Thank you.

Regards,
TB
